name: BUTTON (Nayzal88)
description:
BUTTON

BUTTON is exactly what it sounds like.

There is a button.

You can press it.

If you press it enough times, you can press it even more.

Changelog v1.0 - First release
  • Press the button with Z.
  • Upgrade how many presses you get each time you press the button with X.
  • Clear data by pressing up, then down.
v1.1 - Menu item
  • Added menu item item to clear data.
  • You can no longer clear data the previous way.

Thanks for checking out my silly little game, and don't hesitate to give me feedback :D
